manifest.title: Lilith Chapter Manifest
manifest.description: Tracks all 10 Lilith contemporary chapters across Act II, documenting her power progression, interventions, and the One Buddha belief arc

power_progression.description: Lilith's abilities grow across her chapters as she approaches full manifestation in the present timeline

levels.description: Can perceive others' past lives; accidental influence possible

one_buddha_arc.description: Lilith gradually constructs the tragic belief that only one can achieve Buddhahood per world-system per age. Each beat is felt, not explained—no cosmology, just accumulated observations.

beats.title: Mutual Interference
beats.content: Memory-slice of a life where both rose simultaneously—social disorder, collapse, neither achieving clarity

beats.title: Singularity of the Age
beats.insight: Every age has one… then decay.
beats.content: Glimpses an era defined by a single moral-clarity figure, followed by rapid decline after their death

beats.title: Dwindling Capacity
beats.insight: This era can barely support one ascent.
beats.content: Something in present life—clients, society, difficulty accessing clarity—shows the world is spiritually exhausted

beats.title: Silas as Mirror
beats.insight: He is the only other one.
beats.content: Sees Silas in several past-life flashes across continents and centuries; their evolutions run parallel with uncanny symmetry

beats.title: Fear of Simultaneity
beats.insight: If we rise together, we ruin each other.
beats.content: Remembers the emotional truth—not facts—of a life where simultaneous near-breakthrough produced disaster

beats.title: Misreading as Duty
beats.insight: Someone must choose. Someone must act.
beats.content: Interprets her fear as responsibility. Not jealousy, not ego—duty. Selfhood disguised as moral necessity.

beats.title: The Final False Law
beats.insight: There can be only one. And if he rises now, I will never be free.
beats.content: Compressed flash of all patterns together: singularity of ages, alternation with Silas, collapse of dual ascents, dwindling clarity. Forms the wrong conclusion.

voice_notes.register: Contemporary literary; clinical vocabulary when appropriate
key_patterns: Undermining clause in every significant observation
Sensory anchoring (Manchester setting, her body, clinical spaces)
Loaded gestures (hand hovering over notebook, tension in shoulders)
Environmental metaphor (rain, institutional lighting, her increasingly cluttered flat)

Abstract emotion words (render through physical sensation)
